Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer with two outs in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: This was a rollercoaster and we were able to just keep punching back
There’s only one team that gets to win the last game of the year, and unfortunately it’s not going to be us
Miscellaneous Highlights: New York won the first two at Yankee Stadium without much fanfare or any major drama
However, it was a different story in Cleveland as all three games at Progressive Field were nail-biters
Stanton’s 446-foot rocket into the left-field bleachers tied it at 2 in the sixth
